testcase.brief: Verify read-only user cann't create/modify/delete read-only user
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Create two read-only users in AP
Test Procedure: 1. Use a read-only user to login AP 2. Modify another read-only user's password 3. Delete another read-only user 4. Create a new read-only user

step.desc: Create two read-only user in AP
Read-only user login AP via console 2. Modify read-only user's password
step.log-match: -e "ERROR: login user is not super user"

step.desc: Read-only user login AP via console 3. Delete read-only user
step.log-match: -e "ERROR: login user is not super user"

step.desc: Read-only user login AP via console 4. Create a new read-only user
step.log-match: -e "ERROR: login user is not super user"
